alert.note: Alert for Athens; Gallia; Jackson; Lawrence; Meigs; Vinton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 6:44PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Meigs, northern Gallia, southeastern Jackson, southeastern Vinton, southwestern Athens and north central Lawrence Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 641 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near Oak Hill northeast to Dexter, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pomeroy, Oak Hill, Rio Grande, Albany, Rutland, Gallia, Chester, Vinton, Wilkesville, Adamsville, Radcliffe, Dyesville, Darwin, Salem Center, Harrisonville, Dexter, Centerpoint, Carpenter and Kyger. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for southeastern Ohio.

area.areaDesc: Athens; Gallia; Jackson; Lawrence; Meigs; Vinton
